issue.title: Fix array declaration to be compatible with PHP < 5.4
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 


In _\components\com_easysdi_shop\helpers\easysdi_shop.php_, an array is declare as : 
```
$tempExtractions = [];
```

this is only supported by PHP > 5.4


Fix by using : 
```
$tempExtractions = array();
```


**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
